title: Relative Path Not Supported When Selecting XML File
description: Bug 124067 - When selecting an XML file, the relative path should be supported.
OB: When selecting an XML file, only the absolute path is supported.
EB: When selecting an XML file, the expected behavior is that both relative and absolute paths are supported.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new report.
2. Select an XML file as a data source or dataset.
3. Observe that only the absolute path is used.
